params.text:
• The establishment of appropriate informed consent
    • Will the individual and community have a say in how the data may be used?
  • Confidentiality
    • Who will determine what data is kept confidential and how will this be accomplished? 
  • Anonymization
    • How will individuals remain anonymous in smaller communities or organisations?
  • Boundaries between individual and community/collective knowledge
    • Where, how, and with what control or restrictions research data is stored?
  • Storage
    • In what format, with what infrastructure, at what cost, and who will maintain it for how long?

panels.title: Some questions to consider in developing a data management plan
